title: @Meddler Will Teemo get his own update eventually?
body: Since he got left out of the marksmen update and the mage update (he is kinda a bit of both), will he eventually get his own update?

replies.body:
We're not presently looking at anything on the rework level for him (that I know of), but we are considering him for buffs next patch.  We'll see how they test out.  

He also may be the beneficiary of some of the new or updated items.   {{item:3146}} hype.

PLEASE GIVE ME THE DURATION(or at least part) OF HIS SHROOMS BACK!! i can't even tell you the amount of games i've lost because of the HUGE duration nerf the range in no way makes up for it. you pretty much completely removed my playstyle for teemo from the game. the way i played team was full AP/pen, i would spend most of the the game roaming placing shrooms to get vision for my team. i would also shroom lanes for teammates when they were having a rough time. right now that palystyle is all but completely unviable do to the 5 MIN!!! of durration lost on his shrooms. there is very little to no reward for placing your shrooms in advance since most of them run out before they get hit or do anything at all. setting up a defence is even worse. you used to be able to set up a "last stand" pretty well with teemo if you started preparing far enough in advance, but now the shrooms are already starting to disappear before you get enough of them set down to help you. the current teemo is only viable as an AP marksman, his shrooms are pretty much only used in the middle of fights or directly before. before the nerf i thought about every shroom i put down, i almost never used one of them to clear a wave, but now that's almost exclusively what i use them for and it sucks... really bad. I want my teemo back!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Agreed, I loved playing the swift scout as just that, a scout..

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-19T21:19:50.128+0000)
>
> We're not presently looking at anything on the rework level for him (that I know of), but we are considering him for buffs next patch.  We'll see how they test out.  
> 
> He also may be the beneficiary of some of the new or updated items.   {{item:3146}} hype.

What about this item? {{item:3364}} It allows anyone to clear his shrooms & disable them for 10 seconds for free which is what really hurts his ulti most. If not then if anything I love for you guys to look into this W being so dated & next to useless & buff the bonus speed or it could remove slow debuffs.

We've been looking at his W but it's a tricky case. In a lot of builds, you max it second. Over a really good scaling Q ability.  So while it may feel somewhat outdated, its effectiveness is pretty high.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=000100040000,timestamp=2016-04-20T18:12:34.154+0000)
>
> We've been looking at his W but it's a tricky case. In a lot of builds, you max it second. Over a really good scaling Q ability.  So while it may feel somewhat outdated, its effectiveness is pretty high.

How about making Q better then? If people are maxing W second even tough Q is Teemo main nuke, then maybe it's because it's just not good enough. I think it's the binarity of the blind effect (either too effective or useless) that makes it somewhat less desirable. That and I personally think Q cost too much mana. Your thoughts?
I think the Q mana cost is pretty high, but for an unmissable 80-260 damage ability, it doesn't seem out of line.  Was definitely a place we looked and could potentially change in the future.

EDIT: 

Duration buff reverted. I was happy about something for once, so I should have seen that coming.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=00010004000000030000,timestamp=2016-04-21T21:50:28.041+0000)
>
> I think the Q mana cost is pretty high, but for an unmissable 80-260 damage ability, it doesn't seem out of line.  Was definitely a place we looked and could potentially change in the future.

Increase shroom duration plz 

I was sad when I saw those 7 minute shrooms reverted back to 5

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=00010004000000030000,timestamp=2016-04-21T21:50:28.041+0000)
>
> I think the Q mana cost is pretty high, but for an unmissable 80-260 damage ability, it doesn't seem out of line.  Was definitely a place we looked and could potentially change in the future.

I see. Thanks for replying again. It would be great if Q would feel better to use eventually. I'dd like it to have an effect that is useful against anyone and not just AA reliant champions. Blind has been slowly phased out of the game and it's kinda wierd that Teemo is the only one with such an effect still. Hit kit old age is catching up to him.

What about his E? Does not look like the flashiest ability and is kinda weird to have a passive on hit effect on a shortranged champion. Does not feel neither assassinish or carrysh to me. Is also very statchecky, but couples well with the passive.

>Does not feel neither assassinish or carrysh to me. 

don't make teemo an assassin pls

Honestly, the changes on the PBE (shroom duration and cost, new Morello, more hp items, lower global movement speed, more CDR) will be really spectacular for Teemo.

His base mana regen was so bad anyway that the regen wasn't useful with as fast as he burned mana. 

Between the new Morello for Trapmo, Gunblade, and Rageblade for On-Hitmo, the MYMU is pretty much the perfect collection of Teemo buffs. It's literally everything I've asked for since his abysmal and unnecessary changes in S5.

the reason some people (myself included) max w second over q isn't because q is shit (because it most certainly isn't) it's because it mostly depends on the build as to why you are doing that.

If you aren't building much ap, if any (on hit/ad build perhaps) then there isn't a reason to max q second when w may very well keep you in range more to do more damage than the base damage on q would do. They could increase the base damage or scaling (or both) and if i were doing this kind of build i still wouldn't max it second.

I can see the troubles in deciding whether or not to buff his shrooms as the timer between 5 to 7 minutes seems hesitant on the PBE.

However, I do have to agree that I feel that Teemo's W just feels weak in the current day. He's a lane bully and an assassin, but as a swift scout he really has a poor escape. While the passive effect of Move Quick is rather nice, Teemo's active for his W feels very poor considering how low his aa range is when it comes to harassing. As a result, he is so prone to ganks.

Honestly, a reliable escape tool is what I'd like to see the most on Teemo - he has the potential to have a great ambush while trailing around the map as a scout much like his identity. His shroom ap ratios have been nerfed in the past, so I feel this might help with the on-hit Teemo build while also giving him more mobility to escape ganks.
the problem with his W is that it almost never works as an escape. some new mechanic to it would be great. hes not a tank so simply an moderate ms buff doesn't help that much.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=000100040000,timestamp=2016-04-20T18:12:34.154+0000)
>
> We've been looking at his W but it's a tricky case. In a lot of builds, you max it second. Over a really good scaling Q ability.  So while it may feel somewhat outdated, its effectiveness is pretty high.

If not in his kit, how about visually? He's looking a bit like an 8bit hamster...

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=0001000400000004,timestamp=2016-04-21T22:13:54.031+0000)
>
> If not in his kit, how about visually? He's looking a bit like an 8bit hamster...

They gave him the Udyr treatment.

Omega Teemo was his rework.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=000100040000,timestamp=2016-04-20T18:12:34.154+0000)
>
> We've been looking at his W but it's a tricky case. In a lot of builds, you max it second. Over a really good scaling Q ability.  So while it may feel somewhat outdated, its effectiveness is pretty high.

The problem with teemo is that half of him wants to be a marksman type scout and the other wants to be a DOT based asssassin

i think you should just mini rework him to be one or the other

some ideas that come to mind is his W active ms being doubled when moving towards a target effected by his ult.


Also OP teemo is nothing like a mage.

I've got a real question for you Meddler. Given that you're already indirectly buffing him in several ways (less sustain in lanes, upcoming nerfs to the major MR items in the MYMU, buffing Gunblade) why are you also planning to cut back on every single thing that gates his shrooms in 6.9?

What about put some buff that interact with his kit, for example active free his Word active when he move toward an enemy afflicted with the R shroom or doubles the amount when moved toward an enemy afflicted with the R? Maybe it makes the ability less outdated.

IDK why would any Teemo would downvote this. Sotere spoke the truth here: Teemo's W is outdated but it is nowhere near "next to useless". It's really strong. Slow removal would be welcome, but if I were the one to modernize it I'd lower active speed to 150-160% of passive value and added some way to proc it for free, like IDK, when Teemo kills enemy, epic monster or monster in enemy jungle. Or maybe when someone steps on shroom in a wide nearby.

In most matchups the movement speed from his W is more useful than the damage and the blind duration from his Q.  Teemo needs a better escape than his current W or for his auto attack range to be increased to 550.

Have you considered part of the reason Teemo is suffering is because you've gutted him too many times and aren't returning power in the proper places?

His shrooms' scaling was gutted as far back as pre-season 4 because of the removal of Oracle's Elixir, same as some other nerfs made that patch.  After time passed, Red Trinket became more staple and Teemo's ability to shroom river got gutted(cause of the crab), he's still yet to have that scaling even PARTIALLY reverted.

To make matters worse, despite his shrooms' no longer doing anything resembling a significant amount of damage, their duration got literally CUT IN HALF, thus essentially making his shroom-centric item path no longer a viable option.  The combination of these TWO guttings completely destroyed one of Teemo's strategies.

---

With that gone, Teemo's only playable damage build is stacking on-hit effects with Hurricane.  Unfortunately, there are already plenty of other champions that perform this strategy better than him and with the loss of his item-flexibility, he's become obsolete.

This coming from someone who used to MAIN Teemo and who has multiple Teemo-pentakills, including a 1v5 penta.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika310,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=00010008,timestamp=2016-04-22T04:40:06.911+0000)
>
> Have you considered part of the reason Teemo is suffering is because you've gutted him too many times and aren't returning power in the proper places?
> 
> His shrooms' scaling was gutted as far back as pre-season 4 because of the removal of Oracle's Elixir, same as some other nerfs made that patch.  After time passed, Red Trinket became more staple and Teemo's ability to shroom river got gutted(cause of the crab), he's still yet to have that scaling even PARTIALLY reverted.
> 
> To make matters worse, despite his shrooms' no longer doing anything resembling a significant amount of damage, their duration got literally CUT IN HALF, thus essentially making his shroom-centric item path no longer a viable option.  The combination of these TWO guttings completely destroyed one of Teemo's strategies.
> 
> ---
> 
> With that gone, Teemo's only playable damage build is stacking on-hit effects with Hurricane.  Unfortunately, there are already plenty of other champions that perform this strategy better than him and with the loss of his item-flexibility, he's become obsolete.
> 
> This coming from someone who used to MAIN Teemo and who has multiple Teemo-pentakills, including a 1v5 penta.

This is my main problem regarding Teemo. He has been harshly nerfed so many times and got little compensation in return. I can understand why Riot is afraid to buff Teemo because his kit is considered "toxic" by many, but still it's no reason to be THAT careful when giving him buffs considering all the nerfs he got. 

I also used to LOVE warding both rivers and get objective control. It's what made Teemo unique and was fitting with his "scout" theme. The stupid crab ruined that, and now with the duration being only 5 minutes and weak ratio, the mushrooms sure don't feel like an ultimate anymore.

Before, I would pick Teemo for a few reasons :

1. If they had a team heavily focused on AA
2. If I wanted us to have more vision overall
3. If we needed an AP, I would play AP
4. If we needed more hybrid damage, I would play On-hit

Now, why would you pick Teemo?

1.? Nope, when the enemy is marksmen heavy, you are way better to bring a marksmen top over Teemo.
2.? Mmm, mushrooms only last 5 minutes now and can't be placed around Dragon and Baron anymore...plus sweeper...next!
3.? Errr, his mushrooms ratio are so low AP build is not very good anymore...combined with the duration cut...next!
4.? On-hit build? Sure. But...then you realize you could have brought Gnar, Vayne, Quinn, almost any ranged top with better range/utility/self peel and they would do better then Teemo with an on-hit build...

So yeah, I currently don't see any reason to play my main anymore. Because of this, my interest in playing this game has slowly phased out.

I couldn't count the number of times players have asked Rito to make the crab ignore setting off shrooms.  There must have been at least 1 forum thread demanding it every month since it was added.  Just like countless other player complaints that have gone completely unanswered, some with even more voracity and consistency.

The crab has damn-near killed Teemo's mid-laning potential as the shroom build was the best option for its ability to control both sides of the map.  Teemo was once-upon-a-time amongst the ideal picks for objective-control.  The addition of the crab to the Rift has single-handedly knocked him all the way down from the top to the very bottom and I don't see a fix anywhere in sight, considering Rito's track-record regarding **proper** balance.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-19T21:19:50.128+0000)
>
> We're not presently looking at anything on the rework level for him (that I know of), but we are considering him for buffs next patch.  We'll see how they test out.  
> 
> He also may be the beneficiary of some of the new or updated items.   {{item:3146}} hype.

Thanks for the reply! That's good to know he still has buffs coming his way because he has been quite underperforming since season 6. We will have to see how the items changes affect him too I guess.
*since season 4
Why is Teemo only classified as a marksmen and mage, when he also plays very much like an assassin? Also I would love to see how he gets buffed.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-04-19T22:49:19.068+0000)
>
> Why is Teemo only classified as a marksmen and mage, when he also plays very much like an assassin? Also I would love to see how he gets buffed.

one teemos strengths is his traps and invisibility he can very easily get picks in the jungle on unwary opponents i think they should push for that.

his q could be near sight too and change it to a skillshot with more range valor q though i can't think any ways to make it more unique.

To be fair, he is labelled as an assassin in his secondary category. However, considering that he builds ap as well - he has this odd mix of having all three categories (marksmen/mage/assassin) geared towards him. 

Regardless, I'm glad to see the buffs for Teemo. The 10 to 5 minute duration cut from last year was too harsh for the little guy, so glad to see his shrooms lasting a little while longer in addition to lowering the absurd amount of mana he needed to use with a single shroom at later levels. Though it would be nice to give him a dash or combat roll as  an active to his W since he's not very swift for a "Swift Scout". Despite this...the hextech rocket belt does look very tempting on Teemo.
I'm definately interested in trying out new item builds for him with this coming update.

has it ever been considered to move his ultimate shrooms to a standard ability (like W?) and make them maybe deal less dmg, but still apply the annoying slow/poison? I've always felt he could still keep his identity without the shrooms being a cheese tactic to blow people up, and then you could use the shrooms as kind of a mini game that worked with the rest of his kit and use that to set up a new ability. his character actually has potential...sociopathic cute little yordle who kills....but I feel if you could move his shrooms to a standard ability and make the more utility focused rather than dmg he could be opened up for a new ability that makes him more fun to play as/against that strengthens his character.
If you guys are reworking teemo please keep his shrooms and toxic darts plz plz plz!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKGFjEKU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-19T21:19:50.128+0000)

> 
> He also may be the beneficiary of some of the new or updated items.   {{item:3146}} hype.

Gunblade teemo...... EHM no he wont get better with it

I think that the recent ult duration length change on PBE which was reverted was a very good step in the right direction. Can you maybe elaborate on why it was reverted and consider changing it back? Right now teemo loses lane even to champions like Nasus that he should counter. And I don't think AP teemo will benefit much from the new items because of the mediocre scalings which make him scale with mpen and cdr more than with AP, which sadly the new items dont provide. Basically, Liandries, sorc, void, rabadons rush with maybe a nashors or morello somewhere in there will still be a better option for AP teemo than the new items.

I had once suggested making him a near-damageless scout.
Including:
1. Nerfed attack speed, AP ratios and base damages
2. Buffed vision radiuses on him, Shrooms and Wards
3. Active stealth on ult
4. Shrooms at lvl 1
5. Ult lets him throw shrooms at up to 1000 range.

{{champion:17}}
@Sotere or Meddler: regarding SWEEPING LENS and your new policy that changed QSS
{{champion:35}} 

Quoting said policy from [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/R8IzYt9i-qss-mercurial-change-for-69) ...
_However, what this change allows us to do is create debuff-focused champions that don't have their kits completely negated with an item purchase and press of a button._

Sweeper is far cheaper than QSS (0 cost! no slots!), yet does as much if not more to completely negate Teemo/Shacos primary abilities. Please reconsider how sweeper works in this manner. It can still reveal, maybe shorten activation range....but SHOULD NOT completely disable!
Note how this doesn't disable visible traps either, only the invisible ones. Its really odd design and completely unfair to these 2 champs.
Plz dont forget everyones most favorite/hated yordle and jester :D


also posted @
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/R8IzYt9i-qss-mercurial-change-for-69?comment=001d 
with support from #1 teemo mains like Ivan Pavlov

someday, hopefully
